longMSG:
You are in the steward room on the 2nd floor. 
 There are a desk, a bed and a file cabinet...
and......a Zombie Stewart smiling at you...no, showing his teeth does not mean smiling...
 You may go...
    north to the hallway 2 through the door
shortMSG:
You are in the steward room on the 2nd floor. 
 Features: zombie stewart, bed, desk, fileCabinet 
 Areas you may go to:
    north - door - hallway 2 - 2nd floor
